text:
I would really like to see an auto-save feature that keeps a temporary copy of un-saved changes to a test plan. I've had some devastating experiences of test plan loss when my laptop has crashed, and this could save me from those times of forgetfulness.

Today's loss was several hours of tedious hand-crafted replication of form interactions, brought on by a laptop sleep failure.

Thanks, Matt
creator: matt.kilbride@gmail.com
graham@ham1.co.uk
text:
I think this is a good idea.

We now have a save before run option, https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=61731, which should mitigate some of the risk, but an auto save (separate from the usual save backups) would be even better if we can make sure it doesn't interfere with the current behaviour.
